name: Unbound - Tsutaju Eika's Dream Story

description: Ryusei Yokohama stars as Tsutaya Juzaburo in the official NHK Taiga drama "Berabou: Tsutaju Eika no Yumebanashi." This is the story of the turbulent life of Tsutaya Juzaburo, also known as "Tsutaju," who built the foundations of J...
